text: This video can not be playedNorth Korean state media has broadcast a video showing the country’s latest intercontinental ballistic missile test launch which happened on Wednesday morning. The missile flew for more than an hour before landing short of Japanese waters.Pyongyang's launch comes after it threatened retaliation against what it said were recent US spy plane incursions over its territory.The launch has been condemned by Japan, South Korea and the US.Read more on this story.
title: Watch - North Korean state TV shows latest missile launch
